title: Samsung’s Thinner S25 Variant is Finally Official
description: "One more thing..." The post Samsung’s Thinner S25 Variant is Finally Official appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
text: In addition to the launch of its new Galaxy S25 trio, Samsung also revealed the Galaxy S25 Edge, the long-rumored slimmed-down variant of the S25 family. Samsung wasn’t too keen on sharing specific details on pricing and hardware specifications, but it did tease the device during Samsung Unpacked. READ: Want to Get Samsung’s Newest Galaxy S25 Phones? These Pre-Order Deals will Save You a Ton In comparison to the standard Galaxy S25 model, the S25 Edge will feature a dual-camera setup, in addition to its thinner build. It will presumably come with the same Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset as on the main trio, although it shouldn’t be too surprising if Samsung shaves down other specs such as battery capacity, storage, and such. Samsung adds that the Galaxy S25 Edge will come later in the year, and we might see it launch earlier than Apple’s rumored iPhone Air, which will likewise come with a slim design.
html:
In addition to the launch of its new Galaxy S25 trio, Samsung also revealed the Galaxy S25 Edge, the long-rumored slimmed-down variant of the S25 family. Samsung wasn’t too keen on sharing specific details on pricing and hardware specifications, but it did tease the device during Samsung Unpacked.

READ: Want to Get Samsung’s Newest Galaxy S25 Phones? These Pre-Order Deals will Save You a Ton

In comparison to the standard Galaxy S25 model, the S25 Edge will feature a dual-camera setup, in addition to its thinner build. It will presumably come with the same Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset as on the main trio, although it shouldn’t be too surprising if Samsung shaves down other specs such as battery capacity, storage, and such.

Samsung adds that the Galaxy S25 Edge will come later in the year, and we might see it launch earlier than Apple’s rumored iPhone Air, which will likewise come with a slim design.
